root.name: Phantom of the Asteroids
root.description: STORYAn asteroid full of alien phantoms is hurtling towards the earth. Equipped with a jet pack and a weapon the player has to destroy the asteroid and prevent the phantom invasion. To accomplish this goal the player must collect 36 uranium cubes which are scattered across the asteroid and blow up the asteroid with a nuclear explosion. After gathering all uranium cubes the player has 5 minutes time to reach the teleporter which will take him off the asteroid before it explodes.
